
import java.io.*;
class Main {

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args)throws Exception {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		int n=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine().split(" ")[0]);
		String str=br.readLine();
		int k=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine().split(" ")[0]);
		int l=0, r=0;int z[]=new int[n];
		
		for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(i>r)
			{
				l=r=i;
				while(r<n&&str.charAt(r-l)==str.charAt(r))r++;
				z[i]=r-l;r--;
			}
			else
			{
				if(z[i-l]<r-i+1)z[i]=z[i-l];
				else
				{
					l=i;
					while(r<n&&str.charAt(r-l)==str.charAt(r))r++;
					z[i]=r-l;r--;
				}
			}
		}
		
		z[0]=n;
		int hash[]=new int[n+1];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)hash[z[i]]++;
		
		for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)hash[i]+=hash[i+1];
		
		int i;
		for(i=n;i>=0;i--)if(hash[i]>=k)break;
		System.out.println(i);System.out.println(str.substring(0, i));
	}

}
